question: For the metric 'Gross global Scope 1 emissions, percentage methane, percentage covered under emissions-limiting regulations', what does a company in the Oil & Gas - Midstream industry need to disclose?
optionA: The entity shall disclose its gross global Scope 1 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions to the atmosphere of the seven GHGs covered under the Kyoto Protocol.
